idea-plugin.name: Android Form Factor Toggler
idea-plugin.description:
Adds a handle to Android Studio's toolbar which toggles between phone and tablet mode of the connected device (physical or emulator).

Usage options:
  • Click on the + and - icons in the toolbar (see screenshots on plugin homepage).
  • Search for "Enable Tablet Mode" / "Enable Phone Mode" in "Find actions". (OSX: CMD+SHIFT+A, Win/Linux: CTRL+SHIFT+A)
idea-plugin.change-notes:
0.5.0
  • Initial version of the plugin supporting ONLY phones as connected device (or phone emulators).

action.description: Toggles between phone and tablet mode of the connected device (emulator or physical) by altering its density.
